statements: SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, date, value FROM performance_data WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Usage';
SELECT date, metric_name FROM performance_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM performance_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM performance_data ORDER BY date DESC, value ASC;
SELECT id, metric_name, date, value FROM performance_data WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Utilization' AND value < 50 ORDER BY value ASC, date DESC;
SELECT id, date, metric_name, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM performance_data GROUP BY date, metric_name HAVING avg_value > 75;
SELECT date, metric_name, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM performance_data GROUP BY date, metric_name ORDER BY max_value DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM performance_data;
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data WHERE performance_metric > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, date, category FROM historical_performance_data WHERE category='Sales' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT category, AVG(performance_metric) AS avg_performance FROM historical_performance_data GROUP BY category;
SELECT id, date, trend FROM trends_and_patterns WHERE pattern LIKE '%important%';
SELECT MAX(performance_metric) AS max_performance FROM historical_performance_data WHERE date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM historical_performance_data WHERE category='Sales' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT performance_metric, category FROM historical_performance_data WHERE performance_metric > 100 ORDER BY performance_metric ASC;
SELECT * FROM trends_and_patterns WHERE trend='Upward' AND pattern LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, date FROM historical_performance_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM historical_performance_data WHERE category='Marketing';
SELECT * FROM HistoricalPerformanceData;
SELECT date, value, performance_metric FROM HistoricalPerformanceData WHERE performance_metric='Sales';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceTrends ORDER BY trend_name DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM PerformanceTrends WHERE trend_name='Productivity';
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM DataPatterns WHERE pattern_name='Customer Segmentation';
SELECT * FROM HistoricalPerformanceData WHERE performance_metric = 'Revenue' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, value FROM HistoricalPerformanceData WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM PerformanceTrends;
SELECT pattern_id, pattern_name, pattern_description FROM DataPatterns WHERE pattern_id > 10 ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;
SELECT date, performance_metric, value FROM HistoricalPerformanceData WHERE value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM performance_data;
SELECT id, date, value FROM performance_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM performance_data GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT * FROM trends WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pattern_name, description FROM patterns WHERE pattern_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM performance_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT metric_name, value FROM performance_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patterns WHERE pattern_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT AVG(value) AS average_value, metric_name FROM performance_data GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT trend_name, start_date, end_date FROM trends WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Revenue'
SELECT id, date, metric_name FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT metric_name, value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE value > 1000
SELECT * FROM TrendAnalysis WHERE analysis_type = 'Seasonal'
SELECT id, date, trend FROM PerformanceTrends ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Revenue';
SELECT date, metric_name, value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE value > 10000 AND date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, AVG(value) AS average_value FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY metric_name;
SELECT * FROM PatternIdentification WHERE description LIKE '%anomaly%';
SELECT date, analysis_type, trend FROM TrendAnalysis ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
